hackathon-judges.judge-role: Senior Principal, Accenture Open Innovation Initiative

hackathon-rules:
The most creative hacks win! 
Main judging criteria: 
- Originality and uniqueness
- Technical aspects of hack
- Quality of pitch / demo / prototype

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Free subscription for prototyping tool, Prott
Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 & Prize money (NEC / Lenovo / Intel track)
IBM prize (for users of IBM Bluemix)
